Definitely update the links, downloads and such, maybe even link 
OpenGlad download and info if fsgames and snowstorm would want that. 
The game needs to be premoted more because I think people really 
liked it, but it was never quite complete/more professional. Maybe 
OpenGlad will be the key.

about

gladly
